subject: HTML
question: Write all things that a link must have to be a good link:
answer:
1. It must have a title for more information.
2. It is better to use relative paths rather than absolute paths.
3. Use clear and descriptive link wording (including words like "download pdf, or 50 mbs").
4. When it is a downloadable resource, include the download="something.exe" attribute so it has a default save name.
